title: Pixel 4a,. Had to factory reset. On setup activate. It never gets through activation
content: P4a,. In set up.  it gets to screen to load apps and data.  Option no,yes,. Yes come up with pin code or Gmail address.  Both loops back to original load apps and data screen.  Both in cellular or wifi.  Can't get past this.  Because of this.  You can't enter USB or developer mode.  Been on chat for 5 hours between Google and Google Fi.  It all happened in Android 12.  Can't opt out on developers page 2 days.  Won't reload A11 OTA
